Acure 2% Alpha Brightening Arbutin Serum

Brand: Acure

Category: Serums & Essences

Brand: Acure

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: WATER (EAU), ALPHA-ARBUTIN, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, SAMBUCUS NIGRA FRUIT JUICE, GLYCERIN, SCLEROTIUM GUM, XANTHAN GUM, SODIUM LEVULINATE, POLYGLUTAMIC ACID, HYDROXYETHYLCELLULOSE, PROPANEDIOL, SODIUM PHYTATE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, SODIUM ANISATE, CITRIC ACID.
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
